metadata.name: Missing You
metadata.description:
Time has stopped for me  
Memories come flooding back  
Trying to shut my wounded heart  
my suffering is scary and black

Your hand in mine, at our happy place  
You caressed me with your warm gaze

We were one soul  
Now our ash is all around  
My heart became an empty hole  
Iâ€™m trying to scream without sound

But you don't hear me  
Why don't you hear me ?

Tell me why you ran away  
Who switched off our light ?  
I need to know  
I have to know

Or am I just out of your sight ?


Title: Missing You  
Artist: Diana Junakovic  
Location: Adriatic Sea, Croatia  
Year: 2019  
Edition: 1/1  
Web: https://linktr.ee/dianajunakovic

About the Artist: Diana Junakovic is Croatian award winning photographer, Master of Arts and holder of AFIAP.

License: Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
